description: More travelers plan to work remotely at least once during their holiday vacations this year, a survey found.

title: Bookings for Disney's first cruise in Asia are opening soon. Here's how much the trip costs
description: The Disney Adventure starts at $958 for two people, but rates go higher for those who want ocean views, verandahs and "Frozen" themed suites.

title: The season's hottest gift? A travel 'experience' —  here's how to buy one
description: Travel is hard to give to others, according to a new Accenture survey. CNBC Travel explores several ways to get around the hardest problems.

title: A new luxury sleeper train is launching in England and Wales — here’s what a trip will cost
description: The LVMH-owned luxury hospitality company Belmond is launching a luxury sleeper train that will take travelers through the countryside of England and Wales.

title: FAA bans U.S.-Haiti flights for 30 days after flights struck by gunfire
description: A Spirit Airlines plane was struck by gunfire as it was trying to land at Port-au-Prince airport.

title: Boeing delivers fewest planes since 2020, warns factory restart after strike will take weeks
description: Boeing handed over 14 airplanes in October and said it will be several weeks before production can fully resume.

title: How the ultra wealthy travel in Dubai
description: Dubai went from a sleepy gulf port to a glittering jewel in a single generation. The so-called City of Gold attracts over 17 million visitors a year, but only a select few get to experience the truly over-the-top glitz and glamour it has to offer – until now.

title: Singapore Airlines shares fall 6% as profit nearly halves amid intensifying competition
description: The fall in profits was due to "increased capacity and stronger competition in key markets," the airline said.

title: Temperatures cool in Japan, but inbound travel shows little sign of slowing down
description: Temperatures are cooling in Japan, but interest in visiting shows no signs of abating, as autumn arrivals continue to outpace pre-pandemic levels.

title: American interest in moving abroad skyrockets after Trump's win — here's how many would actually leave
description: Google Trends showed searches related to "leaving the country" and "how to move to …" spiked following the news that Donald Trump is returning to the White House.

title: Airbnb pops on mixed quarterly results
description: CNBC's Deirdre Bosa joins 'Closing Bell Overtime' to talk Airbnb earnings.

title: China extends visa-free policy to 9 more countries — including South Korea
description: This is the latest round of countries to be added to China's ever-growing visa-free policy, designed to spur inbound tourism which has yet to rebound.

title: Wealthy Americans apply for foreign investment visas & passports at record levels
description: CNBC's Robert Frank joins 'Squawk on the Street' to discuss why wealth Americans are seeking foreign residency and investment applications during the election.

title: Is this the world's 'coolest hotel room' for baseball fans? Go inside to see the view
description: Travelers who stay at the hotel inside the Es Con Field Hokkaido stadium can watch baseball games from their rooms or while soaking in natural hot springs.

title: Go inside 'the coolest hotel room — if you're a baseball fan'
description: Take a walk through the "Fighter's Clubhouse," one of eight hotel rooms where travelers can watch baseball games at the attached stadium, the Es Con Field Hokkaido.

title: Barry Diller on potential Uber-Expedia deal: It's not going to happen
description: Barry Diller, IAC and Expedia chairman and senior executive, joins 'Squawk Box' to discuss the state of the 2024 election, his support for Vice President Kamala Harris, his thoughts on Elon Musk, Uber's potential acquisition of Expedia, media landscape, and more.

title: Boeing machinists end strike after approving labor contract with 38% raises
description: The vote is the third time since September that Boeing's machinists are considering a new labor deal.

title: Singapore Airlines will add first class, revamp cabins for longest flights
description: Singapore Airlines will add a first class to its ultra-long-range aircraft and increase the number of business class seats in race for high-spending travelers.

title: Move over Black Friday: Consumer interest in 'Travel Tuesday' soars
description: Search interest for "Travel Tuesday" rose more than 500% over the last two years, according to a report published Thursday by McKinsey & Company.

title: Why flights to Europe are the cheapest they've been in years
description: Airlines have ramped up capacity between the U.S. and Europe in the wake of the Covid-19 pandemic.

title: This European island is likened to the Maldives. I stayed for a week – for $1,500
description: Sardinia has white beaches, turquoise sea and plenty of watersports, rather like the Maldives. And it's possible to travel inexpensively there too.

title: Boeing union backs sweetened contract offer that could end strike, sets vote for Monday
description: The unionized machinists walked off the job on Sept. 13, halting most of Boeing's aircraft production.

title: Booking Holdings beats earnings estimates amid resilient demand for international travel
description: Booking Holdings CEO Glenn Fogel joins CNBC's 'Squawk on the Street' to discuss the company's earnings beat, expectations for the upcoming year, and more.

title: Boeing strike will dent last jobs report before election
description: Some 44,000 U.S. workers, most at Boeing, were on strike during the jobs report tally, according to the U.S. Labor Department.

title: Uber CEO Dara Khosrowshahi on Q3 results: Incredibly optimistic about where we're going from here
description: Uber CEO Dara Khosrowshahi joins 'Squawk Box' to discuss the company's quarterly earnings results, the company's delivery business, interest in Expedia, M&A strategy, autonomous strategy, and more.

title: Bangkok for the super rich: How the ultra-wealthy travel in Thailand's capital
description: The capital of Thailand welcomes millions of visitors each year, but only a select few get to enjoy all the luxury on offer. CNBC's "First Class" takes you on a Bangkok tour like no other.

title: United Airlines raises spending requirements to earn frequent flyer status
description: United Airlines customers will have to spend and fly more to earn elite benefits next year.

title: Airbus delivers first extra-long-range Airbus A321 as smaller jets fly farther
description: The new narrow-body Airbus 321XLR replaces older aircraft like Boeing 757s.

title: Renting a car abroad? These are the countries that intimidate drivers the most
description: A survey of 2,000 drivers from 10 countries shows that motorists are the most nervous to drive in India, Venezuela and Zimbabwe.
